conversion_verification.notes: The 2D floor plan has been successfully transformed into a high-fidelity 3D isometric cutaway model.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness, floor separation, and consistent isometric perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity. Wall placement and room adjacencies match the source plan exactly; minor simplification on some door swinging geometries.

interior_elements.notes: Most furniture, kitchen cabinets, and bathroom fixtures are correctly placed and scaled according to the 2D layout.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean aesthetic with logical lighting. Score slightly impacted by the dark background making some external wall boundaries less distinct.

detected_errors.description: The swing of the interior doors is stylized as arched openings rather than precise architectural door leaves.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and clean 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect geometric alignment with the original architectural floor plan.
